amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding in the Multi-Family Housing Revitalization Program Account and the Rural Business Program account by $100,000,000 and reduce the Food for Peace Title II Grants account by $100,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding in the Multi-Family Housing Revitalization Program Account and the Rural Business Program account by $100,000,000 and reducing the the Food for Peace Title II Grants account by $100,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 285 (Roll no. 429).
